Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed black below; top of rim glazed; exterior: single dot pattern between narrow bands; below, traces of painted decoration consisting of undetermined motif; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.20)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0971) (phase 2)
